name: .CSA File Extension
summary: Learn about .CSA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A CSA file is a game archive used by various games built with the Pixel Tales game engine, such as the horse-themed Star Stable Online, Star Academy, and Star Stable games. It stores multiple game data files, which typically include PME, PTE, and PCO files that may contain 3D models and textures, audio, game scripts, and UI elements. CSA files are compressed and encrypted to reduce the size of the game data files and protect them from being modified.

content: You will most likely only encounter CSA archive files if you play a game built with the Pixel Tales game engine, such as Star Stable, and are looking for game data files in the installation directory on your computer. For example, you can find CSA files in the following installation directory for Star Stable in Windows:

instructions: CSA files are not meant to be opened by a user. Instead, the game the file is packaged with references the CSA file to load its data. However, if you want to modify elements in the game, you can extract the contents of a CSA archive with QuickBMS in Windows.
